headline: Is Xylem’s Impressive 2024 Rally Justified After Strong Earnings and Growth Projections?
summary: If you’re watching Xylem, it’s natural to feel a little buzz right now. The stock has seen an impressive run in 2024, jumping 27.5% year-to-date and holding onto a 4.5% gain just over the last week. Over longer periods, it has delivered 65.4% in three years and an eye-catching 77.7% gain in the last five. Such performance hardly goes unnoticed, and it's fair to wonder whether this is the result of robust business fundamentals, simply changing perceptions of risk, or maybe both. The water...

headline: Xylem Announces Sale of Metering Assets Outside North America
summary: WASHINGTON, October 02, 2025--Xylem has entered into a definitive agreement for AURELIUS to acquire the assets of its water and heat metering business outside North America.

raw.headline: Xylem Announces Sale of Metering Assets Outside North America
